EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners / Randall Thacker (1325618589.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
110 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Randall,
I apologize for my late response; today has been very busy and Im behind on my emails. Look forward to speaking with you. It might be easier to schedule a time using my online scheduler; you can access by going here and booking a time that works for you. https://my.timedriver.com/C9CPC
Steve ___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Consultant Services MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6011 f: 703.793.6081 m: 540.560.8837 e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: Randall Thacker [mailto:randst27@yahoo.com] Sent: Tuesday, January 03, 2012 12:13 PM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: Re: MBO Partners / Randall Thacker
Hi Steve,
Do you have some time to talk today briefly? I'm available at 12:30 p.m. if that works for you.
Randall
From: Steve Arhancet <sarhancet@mbopartners.com> To: randst27@yahoo.com Sent: Sunday, January 1, 2012 2:48 PM Subject: MBO Partners / Randall Thacker Hello Randall, I wanted to follow up with you from our conversation regarding the services provided by MBO Partners. You mentioned you may be starting a new consulting contract. How is that going? Here are a few tools that summarize our conversation from before: There are some webinars and videos we have created that might assist you in finding your next contract if you have not already found one: http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPW1ib0JldGFjdXN0LTE4MjEtMjQ0Ny0wLTEyMjktcHJvZC00MDgmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTAmZGF0YWJhc2VpZD00MDgmc2VyaWFsPTEyOTg5Nzc0NTkmZW1haWxpZD1yYW5kc3QyN0B5YWhvby5jb20mdXNlcmlkPTQ5OTQzJmV4dHJhPSYmJg==&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-partners-webcast-index?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRons67IZKXonjHpfsX84uUpWrHr08Yy0EZ5VunJEUWy2YEDRdQhcOuuEwcWGog8zQ5X MBO Partners continues to invest in being a leader for independent consultants across the country. I also wanted to share the news that we released a study you may be interested in. For the first time, theres real hard facts about The State of Independence in America that will reveal not just how many millions of independent professionals there are in the country, but also the unique things that motivate them and help them stay happily independent. Any update would be great, look forward to hearing from you. Regards, Steve ___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Consultant Services MBO Partners
t: (703) 793-6011 f: 703.793.6081 e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
